column1: # - numbering of psalms: b.PSA 9/10 and all following: The psalm can also be treated as two psalms (Luther: Ps 114+115, but VC Ps 113). Right now, we keep the original numbering. At the moment, we don't check which numbering is used.

# - a.SUS and a.BEL are appendices to b.DAN that are considered apocryph in the Lutheran tradition. Catholic b.DAN.13 <=> Lutheran a.SUS.1; Catholic b.DAN.14 <=> a.BEL.1. We don't systematically check which numbering applies.
